Html:
Hi List,
is there any info about a new Version of Prism for c# 5.0 / .Net 4.5 ?

Thanks
Peter

Peter,

We just finished updating Prism for the Windows Runtime. We've assigned resources to create an updated version of Prism for .NET 4.51. We are still scoping the release. I will publish something around the first of the year.

blaine
